Polygon.name: Polygon
Polygon.details: Polygon is a protocol and a framework for building and connecting Ethereum-compatible blockchain networks.

Polygon.name: QuickSwap
Polygon.details: QuickSwap is a decentralized exchange (DEX) built on the Polygon network, offering fast and low-cost transactions.

Polygon.name: Aavegotchi
Polygon.details: Aavegotchi is a decentralized finance (DeFi) game built on the Polygon network, combining DeFi and NFTs.
